June 20, 2009 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
Partita [Sparke]
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March ('Honest Toil' - Rimmer): 1 Camborne, 95 2 St. Dennis, 94 3 St. Austell, 91
Best Player: Ryan Breen (Eb tuba) Camborne
Best Soprano: Les Kneebone (Camborne) Best Solo Cornet: Lee Wilde (St. Dennis) Best Euphonium: Robert Jose (Camborne) Best Solo Horn: Mark Letcher (Camborne) Best Set of Basses: Camborne
A.R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Joanna Rowe - Camborne, Dominic Turner - St. Dennis
Deportment (judge Gareth Roberts): 1 Bugle (2nd Section) 2 St. Stythians (3rd Section)
Feb. 10, 2010, 2:38 p.m. Aug. 7, 2013, 1:19 p.m.
